name: Rhythm 0
description:
Tired of sucking at rhythm games? What about losing tempo during band practice? Let's not even mention your clumsy feet when you try to dance. Well worry not more, Rhythm 0 is the game for you! Ignore the drum beat and press the spacebar out of tempo to win and unleash your true potential!

Credits:

Niilo - Design and programming

dangalletti - Music and implementation
